subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Stefan Schumacher crashed to the ground a little more than half a mile from the end of a steep climb in the sixth stage of the Tour de France, surrendering the yellow jersey to Kim Kirchen of Team Columbia.
snippet: Stefan Schumacher crashed to the ground a little more than half a mile from the end of a steep climb in the sixth stage of the Tour de France, surrendering the yellow jersey to Kim Kirchen of Team Columbia.
